attributes.action: All Students Should be entitled to get EMA no matter their parents situration.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I'm not entitled to EMA because my parents earn more than 30k. 

Just because they do doesn't mean I get any money from them for travels to and from college !.

I start in September and I'm struggle to find part time  work to fit around the hours I'll be at college ....

I believe all students should be entitled to this and it is totally unfair students have enough pressure as it is (Yes some of us to want to do well).

All my money goes into my films I'm making at college props etc and my bus fare is going to be 500 a year (how am I  going to pay this !).

Your going to be taxing me enough later in my life the least you can do is give all us students a little help until then.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
